body:
😿 
Interesting / promissing thing about the current setup: it *almost* works with transactional fixtures 🎉 
There have apparently been some changes to Rails' test internals that may allow to ditch `database_cleaner` and switch on `transactional_fixtures` instead. I tried it out - it runs super fast. But unfortunately some tests around the `season` model do not really work with this setup 😉
